member.name: T:QWhale.Editor.IHitTestInfo

member.name: M:QWhale.Editor.IHitTestInfo.Reset
member.summary: When implemented by a class, resets HitTestInfo members to their default values.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.IHitTestInfo.HitTest
member.summary: When implemented by a class, gets or sets the HitTest that represents the area of the Edit control evaluated by the hit-test operation.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.IHitTestInfo.Line
member.summary: When implemented by a class, gets or sets the index of line evaluated by the hit-test operation. Contains index of line if mouse is over text line in Edit control; -1 otherwise.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.IHitTestInfo.Pos
member.summary: When implemented by a class, gets or sets the index of character within the line evaluated by the hit-test operation. Contains index of line if mouse is over some text in Edit control; -1 otherwise.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.IHitTestInfo.Item
member.summary: When implemented by a class, gets or sets the IStrItem object evaluated by the hit-test operation. Contains instance of IStrItem object if mouse is over text line in Edit control; null otherwise.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.IHitTestInfo.String
member.summary: When implemented by a class, gets or sets the text string evaluated by the hit-test operation. Contains string if mouse is over text line in Edit control; null otherwise.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.IHitTestInfo.Word
member.summary: When implemented by a class, gets or sets the word evaluated by the hit-test operation. Contains string if mouse is over some word in Edit control; null otherwise.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.IHitTestInfo.Url
member.summary: Gets the hypertext string evaluated by the hit-test operation. Contains string if mouse is over hypertext section in Edit control; null otherwise.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.IHitTestInfo.GutterImage
member.summary: When implemented by a class, gets or sets the Gutter ImageIndex, evaluated by the hit-test operation. Contains index of image if mouse is over the gutter image; - 1 otherwise.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.IHitTestInfo.OutlineIndex
member.summary: When implemented by a class, gets or sets the index of line where outline image is displayed, evaluated by the hit-test operation. Contains index of line if mouse is over the outline button; - 1 otherwise.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.IHitTestInfo.OutlineRange
member.summary: When implemented by a class, gets or sets the IOutlineRange object evaluated by the hit-test operation. Contains instance of IOutlineRange object if mouse is over outline button; null otherwise.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.IHitTestInfo.Page
member.summary: When implemented by a class, gets or sets the index of page evaluated by the hit-test operation. Contains index of page if mouse is over text page in Edit control; null otherwise.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.IHitTestInfo.Style
member.summary: When implemented by a class, gets or sets the index of lexical style evaluated by the hit-test operation. Contains index of lexical style if mouse is over the text; - 1 otherwise.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.IHitTestInfo.TextStyle
member.summary: When implemented by a class, gets or sets the set of additional flags for the text fragment evaluated by the hit-test operation.

member.name: T:QWhale.Editor.ScrollingOptions
member.summary: Defines scrolling behaviour. This enumeration has a FlagsAttribute attribute that allows a bitwise combination of its member values.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.ScrollingOptions.None
member.summary: Specifies that no flags are in effect.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.ScrollingOptions.SmoothScroll
member.summary: Specifies that Edit control should reposition immediately while user tracking the thumb.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.ScrollingOptions.ShowScrollHint
member.summary: Specifies that control should display hint text in the popup window when user tracking the thumb.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.ScrollingOptions.UseScrollDelta
member.summary: Specifies that horizontal scrolling should scroll client area at the several characters rather than one character when caret is at the right border.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.ScrollingOptions.SystemScrollbars
member.summary: Specifies that Edit control should use system scroll bars rather than scrollbar controls.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.ScrollingOptions.FlatScrollbars
member.summary: Specifies that scroll bars appears in flat style.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.ScrollingOptions.AllowSplitHorz
member.summary: Allows user to split Edit control horizontally. This options works only if SystemScrollBars is off and control has Dock property set to DockStyle.Fill.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.ScrollingOptions.AllowSplitVert
member.summary: Allows user to split Edit control vertically. This options works only if SystemScrollBars is off and control has Dock property set to DockStyle.Fill.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.ScrollingOptions.HorzButtons
member.summary: Specifies that scroll bars should display a collection of horizontal buttons at the left side of the horizontal scroll bar. This options works only if SystemScrollBars is off.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.ScrollingOptions.VertButtons
member.summary: Specifies that scroll bars should display a collection of vertical buttons at the bottom side of vertical scroll bar. This options works only if SystemScrollBars is off.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.ScrollingOptions.ScrollByPixels
member.summary: Specifies that scroll bars should calculate their size using pixels rather than characters.

Xml serialization
Gets or sets an xml representation of this Gutter object.
Normally, you do not need to use this property directly. It's used internally when serializing Editor's content to XML.

members.member:
Xml serialization
Gets or sets an xml representation of this EditPage object.
Normally, you do not need to use this property directly. It's used internally when serializing Editor's content to XML.

member.name: T:QWhale.Editor.TextSource.IndentOptions
member.summary: Defines behaviour of Edit control when user presses Enter to insert new text line. This enumeration has a FlagsAttribute attribute that allows a bitwise combination of its member values.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.TextSource.IndentOptions.None
member.summary: No indentation.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.TextSource.IndentOptions.AutoIndent
member.summary: Positions the cursor under the first nonblank character of the preceding nonblank line when user presses Enter.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.TextSource.IndentOptions.SmartIndent
member.summary: Positions the cursor to the line indentation level, obtained from parser supporting option SyntaxOptions.SmartIndent when user presses Enter.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.TextSource.IndentOptions.UsePrevIndent
member.summary: Uses spaces and tabs from previous line when indenting the line.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.TextSource.IndentOptions.JumpToIndent
member.summary: Jumps to indent position rather than adding tabs or spaces.

member.name: T:QWhale.Editor.TextSource.SearchOptions
member.summary: Defines options for search and replace operations. This enumeration has a FlagsAttribute attribute that allows a bitwise combination of its member values.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.TextSource.SearchOptions.None
member.summary: Specifies that no flags are in effect.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.TextSource.SearchOptions.CaseSensitive
member.summary: Specifies that search should be case sensitive.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.TextSource.SearchOptions.WholeWordsOnly
member.summary: Searches only for whole words, rather than matching the text as it occurs within words.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.TextSource.SearchOptions.RegularExpressions
member.summary: Specifies that text to find represents notations for patterns of text rather than the literal character.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.TextSource.SearchOptions.BackwardSearch
member.summary: Specifies that search should be executed towards the beginning of text.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.TextSource.SearchOptions.SelectionOnly
member.summary: Searches only within the selected text in the currently active document.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.TextSource.SearchOptions.EntireScope
member.summary: Specifies that search should start from the beginnig of text.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.TextSource.SearchOptions.SearchHiddenText
member.summary: Specifies that the search includes invisible text, such as an collapsed section.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.TextSource.SearchOptions.FindTextAtCursor
member.summary: Specifies that text at the current position of the active document should be used as text to find.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.TextSource.SearchOptions.PromptOnReplace
member.summary: Specifies that confirm dialog should appear before replacing found text.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.TextSource.SearchOptions.FindSelectedText
member.summary: Specifies that selected text of the active document should be used as text to find.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.TextSource.SearchOptions.CycledSearch
member.summary: Search until current position is reached.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.TextSource.SearchOptions.SilentSearch
member.summary: Search until current position is reached.

member.name: T:QWhale.Editor.SeparatorOptions
member.summary: Specifies options for highlighting and separating lines within Edit control. This enumeration has a FlagsAttribute attribute that allows a bitwise combination of its member values.

member.summary: Specifies that no flags are in effect.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.SeparatorOptions.HighlightCurrentLine
member.summary: Specifies that current line in Edit control should be highlighted.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.SeparatorOptions.HideHighlighting
member.summary: Specifies that current line in Edit control should not be highlighted when control looses input focus.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.SeparatorOptions.SeparateLines
member.summary: Specifies that lines are visualy separated in Edit control.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.SeparatorOptions.SeparateWrapLines
member.summary: Specifies that Line seprator is drawn between lines that are dropped due to word break procedure.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.SeparatorOptions.SeparateContent
member.summary: Specifies that Line seprator is drawn between separate sections of the text, for example between methods.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.SeparatorOptions.SeparateBeyondEof
member.summary: Specifies that Line seprator is drawn between lines beyond end of file.

member.name: T:QWhale.Editor.HitTestInfo
member.summary: Contains information about an area of an Edit control.

member.name: M:QWhale.Editor.HitTestInfo.Reset
member.summary: Resets HitTestInfo members to their default values.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.HitTestInfo.HitTest
member.summary: Gets or sets the HitTest that represents the area of the Edit control evaluated by the hit-test operation.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.HitTestInfo.Line
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of line evaluated by the hit-test operation. Contains index of line if mouse is over text line in Edit control; -1 otherwise.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.HitTestInfo.Pos
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of character within the line evaluated by the hit-test operation. Contains index of line if mouse is over some text in Edit control; -1 otherwise.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.HitTestInfo.Item
member.summary: Gets or sets the IStrItem object evaluated by the hit-test operation. Contains instance of IStrItem object if mouse is over text line in Edit control; null otherwise.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.HitTestInfo.String
member.summary: Gets or sets the text string evaluated by the hit-test operation. Contains string if mouse is over text line in Edit control; null otherwise.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.HitTestInfo.Word
member.summary: Gets or sets the word evaluated by the hit-test operation. Contains string if mouse is over some word in Edit control; null otherwise.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.HitTestInfo.Url
member.summary: Gets or sets the hypertext string evaluated by the hit-test operation. Contains string if mouse is over hypertext section in Edit control; null otherwise.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.HitTestInfo.GutterImage
member.summary: Gets or sets the Gutter ImageIndex, evaluated by the hit-test operation. Contains index of image if mouse is over the gutter image; - 1 otherwise.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.HitTestInfo.OutlineIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of line where outline image is displayed, evaluated by the hit-test operation. Contains index of line if mouse is over the outline button; - 1 otherwise.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.HitTestInfo.OutlineRange
member.summary: Gets or sets the IOutlineRange object evaluated by the hit-test operation. Contains instance of IOutlineRange object if mouse is over outline button; null otherwise.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.HitTestInfo.Page
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of page evaluated by the hit-test operation. Contains index of page if mouse is over text page in Edit control; null otherwise.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.HitTestInfo.Style
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of lexical style evaluated by the hit-test operation. Contains index of lexical style if mouse is over the text; - 1 otherwise.

member.name: P:QWhale.Editor.HitTestInfo.TextStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the set of additional flags for the text fragment evaluated by the hit-test operation.

members.member:
Xml serialization
Gets or sets an xml representation of this Selection object.
Normally, you do not need to use this property directly. It's used internally when serializing Editor's content to XML.

member.summary: Specifies that no flags are in effect.

member.summary: Disables to select any text.

member.summary: Disables dragging the selected text.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.SelectionOptions.SelectBeyondEol
member.summary: Specifies that selection is drawn beyond end of line.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.SelectionOptions.UseColors
member.summary: Specifies that selection should paint preserving colors of the text fragments.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.SelectionOptions.HideSelection
member.summary: Specifies that selected text should be draw as unselected text when control lost focus.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.SelectionOptions.SelectLineOnDblClick
member.summary: Specifies that whole line should be selected instead of single word when user double clicks on some text.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.SelectionOptions.DeselectOnCopy
member.summary: Specifies that selection should be unselected when selected text copies to the Clipboard.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.SelectionOptions.PersistentBlocks
member.summary: Specifies that selected text should be retained even when the cursor is moved, until a new block is selected.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.SelectionOptions.OverwriteBlocks
member.summary: Specifies that selected text should be replaced of text with whatever is typed next.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.SelectionOptions.SmartFormat

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.SelectionOptions.WordSelect

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.SelectionOptions.DrawBorder
member.summary: Specifies that Edit control should draw border around selection.

member.name: F:QWhale.Editor.SelectionOptions.DeselectOnDblClick
member.summary: Specifies that selection should be cleared by dblclick.

member.summary: Specifies that selection should copy it's content clipboard in rtf format.
